casebody.data:
No. 10-879. Gloria Gail Kurns, Executrix of the Estate of George M. Corson, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. Railroad Friction Products Corporation, et al. 565 U.S. 972, 132 S. Ct. 474,

181 L. Ed. 2d 310,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7602. October 28, 2011.

Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
